programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: My Stupid Boss
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: It Takes A Man And Women
programme.desc: Jalan cerita tentang seorang gadis miskin yang bekerja dengan seorang lelaki kaya di sebuah syarikat penerbitan majalah. Dia bercinta dengan lelaki tersebut namun lelaki itu telah berlaku curang kerana mementingkan diri. Gadis tersebut pergi membawa diri ke Amerika Syarikat untuk bekerja dan setelah beberapa tahun dia menjadi seorang perunding penerbitan yang berjaya dan professional. Suatu hari, syarikat lelaki tersebut mengalami masalah dan memerlukan seorang perunding penerbitan. Lembaga pengarah telah menghantar gadis itu untuk menjadi perunding bagi menyelamatkan syarikat tersebut.

programme.title: Tmo Muka Surat Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Muka Surat Cinta

programme.title: Jeman
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Jeman yang berusia 20an mengalami masalah lembam, ibunya meninggal dunia ketika melahirkannya.Jeman dibesarkan oleh neneknya Mak Wan. Manakala ayahnya Jalil sudah berkahwin lain.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Momzillas
programme.desc: Clara dan Minerva, dua wanita yang berkongsi lelaki yang sama, bertemu semula apabila anak lelaki dan anak perempuan masing-masing berkahwin.

programme.title: Nawfal Nak Raya
programme.desc: Raya tahun ini Nawfal perlukan baju melayu baru kerana baju yang lama sudah dipakai beberapa kali and dah tak muat. Nawfal mengajak kawan baiknya Rosyam Nor untuk mengumpul duit demi menunaikan impianya.

programme.title: Detak Jantung di Detik Yang Berbeda
programme.desc: Jasmine yang menghidap penyakit jantung teruk sembuh dengan bantuan penderma jantung Nindy. Jasmine ingin tahu untuk mengenal pasti siapa yang menyelamatkan nyawanya, dan dia akhirnya mengetahui bahawa Nindy adalah orang yang memberikan kepadanya. Suatu hari, Dion melawat kubur Nindy dan memberitahu dia masih tidak boleh meneruskan kehidupannya dan terlalu trauma untuk menjalinkan hubungan semula. Namun, Jasmine terkilan kerana jantung Nindy berdegup kencang di dalam dirinya. Untuk membalas budi baik Nindy, Jasmine ingin menjaga Dion sebagaimana dia menjaga hatinya.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep106
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Star Ep16
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Sejadah Ep30
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep59
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep107
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. programme.title: Kalau Cinta Sudah Menjadi Bubur
programme.desc: Selepas menghabiskan bubur di gerai Rahmat, Maria terus melarikan diri. Lagipun, dia kecewa kerana teman lelakinya meminta putus. Namun siapa sangka pertemuan awal yang berakhir dengan pergaduhan membuahkan cinta antara Rahmat dan Maria?

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep50
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Kata Ustadz Solmed Ep10
programme.desc: Kata Ustadz Solmed merupakan program bual bicara yang dibimbing oleh pengacara dan ustaz terkenal yang akan fokus membincangkan tentang masalah yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat sehinggalah masalah rumah tangga dari sudut agama.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep10
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.desc: Danang, anak Pak Amir, menjalani kehidupan yang lebih baik. Isteri Pak Amir secara mengejut menghidap penyakit kritikal, tetapi Danang tidak mahu ibu bapanya menyusahkannya. programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep127
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Aku Hanya Butuh Kata Maaf Bukan Kata Perpisahan
programme.desc: Ruli sering dipandang rendah oleh keluarga mentua kerana gaji isterinya lebih besar daripadanya. Selepas Ruli tiba-tiba berjaya kerana wanita lain, dia menjadi sombong dan membalas dendam terhadap isterinya April.

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep8
programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep12
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Destiny
programme.desc: Ji-woo is still hung up on a man she fell in love in her early twenties. Her worried father has no choice but to drag her to Gi-joon, who helps people to locate their long-lost first loves.

programme.title: Innocent Witness
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: Friend: The Great Legacy
programme.desc: Joonsuk recruited Sunghoon, a young guy he met in prison, to help him in the gang. Little did he know Sunghoon was the son of Dongsu, whom he was suspected to kill.

programme.title: Tunnel
programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: The Day I Died: Unclosed Case
programme.desc: A girl disappeared by the cliff and her body was not found. Detective took charge to investigate this mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: 71: Into The Fire
programme.desc: 71 student-soldiers fight an impossible war against the elite 766 Commando Brigade and turn the tide of the Korean War.

programme.title: Oh! My Gran
programme.desc: When his daughter suffer from a hit-and-run accident, her father tries to track down the driver with help from his mother who has Alzheimer's disease and the only witness to this accident.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Rv: Resurrected Victims
programme.desc: Surreal cases are reported globally where victims come back to life to avenge the murderer. One day, prosecutor Jin-hong’s dead mother returns home and tries to kill him…

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective 2: In Action
programme.desc: A homicide detective and a comic book storekeeper recruit an online private eye to launch a full-fledged investigation on a murder case.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Innocent Witness
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: Crazy Romance
programme.desc: Two co-workers navigate their feelings for each other through a minefield of office gossip and social media.

programme.title: Unbowed
programme.desc: A math professor was not re-hired for pointing out errors in the university entrance exam. Losing the lawsuit against the university, he carries his crossbow to the judge for justice.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Midnight Runners

programme.title: The Battleship Island

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10651066
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46094610
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2031
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3599
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2033
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep153
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3601
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46114612
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep153
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10691070
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1810
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1040
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster…

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong’s neon nights. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack…

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: Namiya is a Chinese adaptation of the novel, Miracles Of The Namiya General Store, by best-selling author, Keigo Higashino. When three runaways shack up in an abandoned general store, a supernatural correspondence connects them to many lives that were all touched by the owner of the store years before they were born.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company with all women staff. As he is clueless with women, he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join and help him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love, Mona.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: Cold War 2
programme.desc: Sean Lau is now the Police Commissioner after the successful rescue operation Cold War. However, the culprits from the past not only dodged justice but even escalated their actions and kidnapped Lau’s wife. He breaks every protocol to get her back, which puts him under investigation.

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his “wife” comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters’ best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A boy’s marriage proposal was rejected by the girl and the lovers separated. Nonetheless, they agree on a break-up contract stating that if both are single in five years they will get married. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other’s parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents’ first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards’ heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully on their master’s birthday.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them…

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu’s until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the men’s help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: Pursuit of a Killer
programme.desc: The charm of Pursuit Of A Killer lies in the long awaited reunion of Five Venoms duo, Lo Meng and Sun Chien; Lo Meng, who plays a Mainland Chinese criminal escapee to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop (Sun Chien) who helps him adjust to Hong Kong life while tracking down his mysterious killer at the same time.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandma’s pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chief’s daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Disciples of the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Young Avenger
programme.desc: Liu seeks out Li to avenge his brother’s death and loses an arm in the fight, vowing revenge ten years later. Li dies after asking his sister to send his daughter Bao Zhu to learn the Dragon Sword skill to avenge his death. Bao Zhu grows up to become a skilled swordswoman and meets Liu for the planned duel with her cousin Chen. Can she defeat Liu?

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the general’s escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlong’s younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles…

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: Constantly being abused by her cruel husband, the frail Chan Sau Ying awaits death from tuberculosis. The new servant girl Yi Wah, takes pity on her mistress’ plight and the pair proceed to drown him one evening. They dump his body in a nearby pond but Sau Ying believes that the man’s bloated corpse has risen from the bog to seek vengeance.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Bao’s chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: With Hong Kong cinema's new wave, high flying, martial arts action of the 1980's, came a new wave of actors; teeny-bopper, canto-pop singer/stars with little or no martial arts background. However, when a film like LITTLE DRAGON MAIDEN intelligently mixes the old with the new, the results are pure golden magic. This costume-action, drama, love story features relative newcomer Leslie Cheung, who falls in love with the Dragon Maiden while learning the art of swordplay. The recipe is complete when veteran kung-fu stars Chen Kuan-tai and Lo Lieh add just enough weapon-wielding spice to make this film really cook. Cheung garnered international recognition in John Woo's A BETTER TOMORROW and Ronny Yu's THE BRIDE WITH WHITE HAIR.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General’s henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: In The Sword And The Lute, Kwei Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) and his partner (Chin Ping) are on a mission to destroy the "Phoenix Lute", a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles up to 500 paces and which can only be destroyed by the Kan curved sword...

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponent’s son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chan’s elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.desc: Multiple mutilated women with the words, ‘Respectez Asia’, carved on their skin, have been discovered. Coroner Dr. Abel believes that the suspect in question is innocent and strives to uncover the twisted family tragedy behind the slayings.

programme.title: The Furlough
programme.desc: Four inmates with vastly different convictions are granted a 48 hours furlough. Some seek to redeem failed relationships while others search for vengeance. But above it all, each of them seeks to reclaim their dignity and lust for life once again.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Based on true stories retold by Palestinian refugees, this animation focuses on 11 year-old Wardi’s life in a Lebanese camp. One day, her beloved great-grandfather entrusts her with his most prized possession – the key to their ancestral house in Galilea.

programme.title: Love In Monaco
programme.desc: Mehdi, a 30-year-old man living with his mother in the housing projects, finds himself with a tidy sum of money after winning the lottery. He decides to play high rollers in Monaco with the money, and assumes a new identity as a Moroccan prince.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.

programme.desc: Behrad is disappointed because the Legends have forgotten his birthday, so when they track an alien pod to 2024 and wind up on his favorite television sitcom, he thinks it's really a surprise for him.

programme.title: The Flash S9 11
programme.desc: The Flash S9 11

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 06
programme.desc: Sheldon goes up against WIL WHEATON for the role of the new Professor Proton, while Penny steps in to take care of Halley when Bernadette & Howard are laid up on bed rest.

programme.title: Friends S7 6
programme.desc: Rachel and Phoebe compete to be Monica's maid of honor--but Monica doesn't want to make the decision. Phoebe eventually allows Rachel to fulfill the duty. Chandler tries to apologize to a girlfriend from his youth.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Brace for impact - 20 of the world's dumbest adrenaline junkies are about to hit your screen! We've got a wannabe astronaut taking one giant leap off a roof, a girl who plays chicken with a bull, and a hot-air balloon wedding that hits the ground screaming. With spine-tingling commentary from our hilariously hardcore cast.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 15
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q put the nasty in "namaste" when they lead guided meditations that leave their victims with a lot to think about. And the big loser gets boxed in with the very first 24-hour punishment.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 8
programme.desc: Michael mystifies laundromat patrons by impossibly multiplying miniscule amounts of detergent, and makes one man's day when he convinces him that he's hit the coin machine jackpot. Then at a thrift store, Michael taps into his musical abilities by turning into a human record player. Plus, as an employee at a shipping store, he astonishingly flips a full bowl of punch without spilling a drop and repeatedly teleports a glass penguin to one customer's dismay.

programme.title: Gossip Girl S1 3
programme.desc: Blair uncovers scandalous information about Serena that may not remain a secret much longer.

programme.title: The Flash S7 12
programme.desc: When Cisco and Kamilla tell the team they are leaving Central City, Barry, Iris and Caitlin enlist them one final time to deal with Rainbow Raider.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 01
programme.desc: In the series premiere, ex-Navy SEAL Martin Riggs (CLAYNE CRAWFORD) is paired up with by-the-book LAPD detective Roger Murtaugh (DAMON WAYANS) in a partnership that could be lethal.

programme.title: Gossip Girl S1 3

programme.title: Young Sheldon S6 19
programme.desc: For 13-year-old Sheldon Cooper, it isn't easy growing up in East Texas. And while the vulnerable, gifted and somewhat naïve Sheldon deals with the world, his family must find a way to deal with him.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S6 20
programme.desc: For 13-year-old Sheldon Cooper, it isn't easy growing up in East Texas. And while the vulnerable, gifted and somewhat naïve Sheldon deals with the world, his family must find a way to deal with him.

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wall Street's Jonah Hill and Whiplash's Miles Teller star in this dramedy based on a true story that follows two twenty-something Miami stoners who exploit a little-known government initiative during the Iraq War that allows small businesses to bid on U.S. Military contracts. Starting small, they begin raking in big money and are soon living the high life. But the pair gets in over their heads when they land a $300 million deal to arm the Afghan Military -- a deal that puts them in business with some very shady people, not the least of which turns out to be the U.S. Government. Comedy powerhouse Todd Phillips (The Hangover films) writes, directs and produces (with Bradley Cooper) this incredible true story based on a controversial Rolling Stone article.

programme.desc: Use a Slurpy, Go to Jail-Doogie and Vinnie become hostages when a young black gang member attempts to rob the store where Vinnie works.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep19
programme.desc: Heroes-The 4077th becomes a media circus when the middle-weight boxing champ has a stroke while at the M*A*S*H unit on a publicity junket. Hawkeye becomes the center of the media pummeling when the boxer dies while under his care. Meanwhile, B.J. invents a new medical electroshock technique while trying to save the life of a patient. The patient lives but the press ignores the story in favor of the weightier news of the death of the champ.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep18
programme.desc: Homes, Sweet Homes-When a wealthy Beverly Hills couple is robbed of valuable Egyptian art treasures, the Angels suspect the dapper real estate baron, Barry Kingsbrook. Kris infiltrates the Kingsbrook Agency as an agent.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Lucy Meets the Law-Lucy tosses a candy wrapper into the street and is chastised by Mary Jane. Feeling guilty, Lucy tries to retrieve the wrapper just as a red-headed female thief, being pursued by the police, slips a jewelry case into Lucy's handbag and disappears into the crowd.

programme.title: The Winds Of War Ep01
programme.desc: The Winds Rise-The year is 1939 and Adolf Hitler is meeting with his staff to begin the nightmare that wil become World War II.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Legend-The IMF is assigned the task of infiltrating a clandestine meeting of top-ranking Nazis and disrupting their plans to reestablish the Third Reich in "The Legend"

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep05
programme.desc: A Most Unusual Wood Nymph-Gerry O'Toole, a beautiful Irish girl who is a friend of Darrin's aunt arrives for a visit and announces she plans to stay with the Stephens until she gets a job.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep06
programme.desc: Endora Moves in for a Spell-Uncle Arthur pops out of a painting in the Stephens home. Samantha tells him she is trying to stop Endora from encouraging Tabitha to use her witchcraft.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep13
programme.desc: Lucy, the Fight Manager-Lucy Carmichael turns fight manager after she fails to talk Mr. Mooney into loaning $3000 to an ex-pug named Eddie Rickles.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep20
programme.desc: Sons and Bowlers-A neighboring Marine unit has been challenging the 4077th to a variety of sporting matches — and beating the medical team at everything — until Potter suggests a bowling match. Despite enlisting a tutorial from a pro bowler, the Marines are finally defeated by the M*A*S*H team. Hawkeye places a call to his dad after finding out his father needs surgery, and manages to tell his father that he loves him. Charles is surprisingly supportive of Hawkeye during this troubled time.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep13
programme.desc: King of the Hill-A young Marine veteran suffers a psychotic breakdown, which causes him to believe he is back in the battle zone in Vietnam. When Danny Williams tries to assist him, Austin holds him prisoner in a hospital ward.

programme.desc: King of the Hill-A young Marine veteran suffers a psychotic breakdown, which causes him to believe he is back in the battle zone in Vietnam. When Danny Williams tries to assist him, Austin holds him prisoner in a hospital ward.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep20
programme.desc: Sons and Bowlers-A neighboring Marine unit has been challenging the 4077th to a variety of sporting matches — and beating the medical team at everything — until Potter suggests a bowling match. Despite enlisting a tutorial from a pro bowler, the Marines are finally defeated by the M*A*S*H team. Hawkeye places a call to his dad after finding out his father needs surgery, and manages to tell his father that he loves him. Charles is surprisingly supportive of Hawkeye during this troubled time.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep07
programme.desc: Twitch or Treat-Darrin is incensed when Endora makes a house appear near the Stephens home for a Halloween party. When Samantha begs her mother to remove the house, Endora decides to hold her party in the Stephens home.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep08
programme.desc: Dangerous Diaper Dan-Diaper Dan, secretly working for the A.J. Kimberly Adver-tising Agency, gives Samantha a baby rattle. Samantha, proud of Darrin's creative ability, describes his ad campaigns to Endora.

programme.desc: Lucy Meets Sheldon Leonard-Popular movie gangster turned TV producer Sheldon Leonard (playing himself) gets permission from Mr. Mooney to film a scene for a TV pilot in the bank after working hours.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep21
programme.desc: Picture This-Potter wants a picture of the entire M*A*S*H unit as a gift for Mildred’s birthday and is pleased with the simplicity of his idea. programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep10
programme.desc: I'd Rather Twitch Than Fight-Darrin is furious when Samantha gives his checked sport jacket, bought before he was married, away. Meanwhile, Louise, lectures Samantha on the importance of clothing and the gifts married couples exchange.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep22
programme.desc: That Darn Kid-A goat eats $22,000 in payroll cash while Hawkeye is paymaster and I-Corps is holding an in investigation. The I-Corps investigator, Major Van Zandt, determines the goat story implausible and says Hawkeye is responsible and must repay the money. After it is arranged that the goat in question eats Van Zandt’s report, Van Zandt sees things differently and Hawkeye is released from his obligation. While everyone else is concerned with the goat and the payroll, Charles is more concerned with the money he borrowed from Rizzo to buy a vase which turned out to be worthless. Rizzo charges %100 interest per day.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep15
programme.desc: The Face of the Dragon-McGarrett and his team of police experts go into action when a man who is carrying the bubonic plague turns up in the Hawaiian Islands and the plans for a top-secret military weapon disappear. To thwart a possible epidemic, McGarrett must find the carrier of the plague.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep2
programme.desc: Meet The Competition - A second group of bakers is challenged to scour the kitchen to figure out what has been baked.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep3
programme.desc: Just Desserts - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge. The best dessert detectives continue on in the competition and the duo that falls short heads home.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep4
programme.desc: Decisions, Decisions - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge. The best dessert detectives will move forward in the competition and the duo that falls short will head home.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep5
programme.desc: Rock And Roll - The best dessert detectives continue on in the competition and the duo that falls short heads home.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep6
programme.desc: Red, White And Clue - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge. The best dessert detectives continue on in the competition and the duo that falls short will head home, guest judge Aarón Sánchez.

programme.title: In The Line Of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent seeks to redeem himself by saving the life of his country's highest elected official, even if it means sacrificing his own.

programme.title: A Dark Truth
programme.desc: An ex-CIA op-turned-political talk show host is hired by a corporate whistleblower to expose her company’s cover-up of a massacre in a South American village.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: James Dial, once a top CIA assassin and now retired, is called back by the CIA to kill a terrorist leader in London. But Dial learns that once his mission is accomplished, he will be next on the hit list, to remove any traces of American involvement.

programme.title: Bad Country
programme.desc: Bad Country concerns a veteran Baton Rouge detective who infiltrates the most powerful criminal enterprise in the South and after taking down its top lieutenant and contract killer, convinces him to turn informant to help bring down the entire organization.

programme.title: A Single Shot

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Hong Kong - Michael begins his adventures in Hong Kong, with railway highlights including the cable funicular to the top of Hong Kong's highest mountain, the Peak, and the enviably efficient and shiny Mass Transit System.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle (S9) Ep9
programme.desc: Uruguay - Ben Fogle meets Rhona Mitra who has swapped her home in Hollywood for a remote farmhouse in Uruguay.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep1
programme.desc: An all-American candy company makes 200,000 packages of red licorice every day; a zippy mayonnaise packs the punch of spicy Sriracha; 40,000 Turkish bourekas are produced every day; and Laceys feature a chocolate centre sandwiched between two wafer-thin cookies.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep2
programme.desc: 1.8 million cherry chews are produced from just one single batch; massive silos of wheat are transformed into 'elbow' macaroni pasta; a continental cranberry cheesecake first started as a Christmas experiment; and meet chakri, the exotic southeast Asian snack that's hand-twirled and fried to crispy perfection.

programme.title: The Age of Nature (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Awakening - Discover how a new awareness of nature is helping to restore ecosystems across the globe, with inventive actions being taken to repair manmade damage and restore reefs, rivers and animal populations.

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Simon joins an Aussie rancher to round up camels using a specially-adapted off road vehicle and a chopper.

programme.desc: Race Against Time - The coast can be a rich hunting ground, but opportunities never last long so hunters are always in a race against time.

programme.desc: Haiti - Before leaving Cuba, Joanna gets as close as possible to Guantanamo Bay, before taking a short boat trip to Haiti, a nation born from slave revolution with a strong tradition of voodoo.

programme.desc: Dr. Mosley meets with eight Australians diagnosed with type 2 diabetes or pre-diabetes who dream of getting their health back and turning their lives around. Together with Ray, Dr. Mosley will guide the participants through drastic diet and lifestyle adjustments.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep5
programme.desc: There's a waterfall of chocolate at a California candy factory; meet the saucy squad behind mountains of cannelloni; find out what it takes to make rice noodles by the truckload; and a hardworking team takes the hassle out of preparing butternut squash.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep6
programme.desc: From tree to bottle, follow the amazing story of maple syrup; there's a 'tower of power' behind a delectable Almond Roca butter toffee popcorn; a British Columbia candy company is giving Turkish Delight a thoroughly modern twist; and find out the secret behind apples that taste like grapes.

programme.title: Big Cats: The Science of
programme.desc: Scientists are constantly making discoveries that reveal new insights into big cat behaviour and physiology. This programme explores big cats ranging from cheetahs to Andean mountain cats.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Northumberland - Kate walks a 15-mile stretch of St Oswald's Way in Northumberland. Her starting point is the picturesque village of Alnmouth, once a leading grain port in the 18th century.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, an old WW2 detention centre is transformed into a gleaming new university, while respecting the old buildings beneath. And in Wisconsin, USA, and old polluting power station is stripped down and re-engineered into a spacious student facility with study spaces and exercise facilities.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green (S4) Ep2
programme.desc: Patagonia - Robson's journey continues in Patagonia, where he goes on the hunt for the massive Chinook Salmon.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep7
programme.desc: It takes 80,000 apples to produce a single batch of fruit leather; discover the secret to making squeaky cheese curds; Hello Dolly bars are getting a vegan encore; and there's a fun-loving pit crew behind every tub of a Canadian guacamole.

programme.title: Food Factory (S5) Ep8
programme.desc: See the chocolate factory behind exotic truffles; eco-friendly coffee pods combine guilt-free caffeine with all the convenience; 250,000 gyoza dumplings roll off the assembly line every day; and meet the inventor of Moon Cheese.

programme.title: Lion: The Rise and Fall of the Marsh Pride (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Marsh Pride of lions have lived for generations in Kenya's famous Maasai Mara Reserve. The pride's history is a tale of shifting loyalties, bloody take overs and sheer resilience. Naturalists, guides, vets and conservationists in Kenya and back in the UK offer a unique perspective on the life of these lions.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Galapagos - Martin explores the legendary Galapagos, getting up close to sealions, iguanas, tortoises, penguins, finches and baby sharks. He joins conservation expeditions, sees evolution in action, visits a nun, an organic farm and the site of a murder mystery.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Electric Car - Hannah Fry discovers why innovations in meat packing almost derailed the electric car revolution and how a breakthrough in camcorder batteries led to Elon Musk's electric empire.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green (S4) Ep3
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea - Papua New Guinea is home to a rare fishing prize - often called the best freshwater fighting fish on the planet: the Papuan Black Bass.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloo’s conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Buck Chase - Join Amanda on a white knuckle bush-whacking adventure to rescue a waterbuck caught by a poacher's snare. Meanwhile, the center's resident hyena is treated for flea bitten ears and Alma gets a mysterious late night monkey delivery.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary - On the West Coast of the United States, the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary is the largest marine sanctuary in the country - home to 525 species of fish, and a massive, underwater Kelp forest.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Interior - Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rana: Queen of the Jungle - One of the most iconic animals on Earth stalks the jungles of India: the Bengal Tiger. Over the course of a single day, we follow the fortunes of one mother and her three young cubs. She must provide enough food for her family to stay alive.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Tree Tales - Trees are Africa’s oldest residents, and each has its own strategy for surviving the dry season. The sausage tree and the fig tree ride-out seasonal extremes, to provide food and shelter for struggling animals in the lean times. In return animals help these trees to reproduce by pollinating their flowers and dispersing their seed. African trees promote life, and form the backbone of one of Earths’ most precious ecosystems.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloo’s conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Buck Chase - Join Amanda on a white knuckle bush-whacking adventure to rescue a waterbuck caught by a poacher's snare. Meanwhile, the center's resident hyena is treated for flea bitten ears and Alma gets a mysterious late night monkey delivery.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep3

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Eyes - Why do zebras have stripes? How do penguins see underwater? And why are a tree frog’s eyes red? In this exploration of sight, discover how some animals have evolved to see extremely well while others have evolved to be nearly invisible.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Social Animals - Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Ancient Lineages - Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Youngsters of the Desert - A young lion cub must survive as his family is torn apart; two adolescent leopard cubs must fend for themselves after they are abandoned, and a young adult blackbuck must risk life and limb as he tries to secure his first mating.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cocos Island - Dubbed "the most beautiful island in the world" by Jacques Cousteau, Cocos Island is a gem among Costa Rica’s national parks. Aboard the Undersea Hunter, we’ll explore the area’s hammerhead and Galapagos sharks, rays, and other large marine species that populate these deep waters.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: The Ocean's Greatest Feast - Get a front-row seat to the planet’s biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa’s east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creatures Great and Small - See Amanda and Sophie push boundaries to get a vervet monkey with a broken leg back into the wild, the team is challenged when collaring a four-ton elephant. Alma receives an orphaned, cat-like genet and an antisocial baboon rejoins a troop.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary - On the West Coast of the United States, the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary is the largest marine sanctuary in the country - home to 525 species of fish, and a massive, underwater Kelp forest.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.desc: Cradle of Mankind - Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Surrogate Families - Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals we’ll meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who have surrogate families.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Herd Mentality - Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore what’s it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Rajan Monkey on a Mission - Rajan is the powerful alpha male who sits at the head of an unusually large troop. He has done well to sustain such a big group, but the future doesn’t look so bright. There are more mouths to feed, and yet his jungle home is shrinking.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Socorro Islands - A wild and remote chain 400 kilometres south of Cabo San Lucas in the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. They're known for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, hammerhead schools, dolphins, and tiger sharks.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Catch Me if You Can - Join the rescue as Amanda and Mandy try every trick in the book to help a snared hyena, a lion threatens a village, and the team's plan to release a troop of 13 monkeys is thwarted by last minute surgery and some crafty escape artists.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.
