programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep30
programme.desc: Farewell, General Sherwood / Zoom Boomer - After a memorial for a famous tree that has fallen, Archibald discovers that Sage has never cried and vows to help his brother get in touch with his emotions. / When Archibald wins the chance be shot from a cannon at the circus, he has no idea everyone in town is vying to be his plus one.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep29
programme.desc: Gorgey Girl / A Gran Adventure - Eep has the first pen pal in Gulp Gorge/Gran sends Ugga and Eep on the first treasure hunt when she decides to pass on her inheritance

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep2
programme.desc: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail - When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep28
programme.desc: Audrey Dreams of Ice Cream / Blame that Tune - While sampling international ice creams, Audrey bites off more than she can chew. An earworm turns the Harvey Street kids into zombie-like "songies."

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep28
programme.desc: Mighty Snails/Silent But Deadly - Burn is forced to coach a lousy tetherball team -- and gets inspired by an old rival; White Shadow's karate skills are tested by a ninja stinkbug.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep8
programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep30
programme.desc: Farewell, General Sherwood / Zoom Boomer - After a memorial for a famous tree that has fallen, Archibald discovers that Sage has never cried and vows to help his brother get in touch with his emotions. / When Archibald wins the chance be shot from a cannon at the circus, he has no idea everyone in town is vying to be his plus one.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier's Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills…/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Troll’s fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep18
programme.desc: Verry Berry Gets It Together/Fur Mountain - When Verry Berry's adventurous spirit gets her in trouble, she joins up with a colony of army ants to learn discipline. / When Twig disappears into the coat of a dog and cohabitates with a bunch of fleas, the Mighty Ones must convince him that fleas are not his friends.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep38
programme.desc: Parrot Booty - When Puss and the pirates find the treasure of San Luis Rey, they must find a way to escape the attack of Bonky the Parrot and his skeleton army.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep75
programme.desc: Darkest Night - When Stoick is shot down Hiccup and the riders race back to Berk to help

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep76
programme.desc: Guardians Of Vanaheim - The riders race to Vanaheim and discover the Flyers have ransacked the Island

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep45
programme.desc: The Case Of The Big Pile of Cabbages - When Noddy comes to give Smartysaurus an invitation to Queen Sparklewings's picnic, there's a big pile of cabbages blocking her front door. Noddy investigates: who left the big pile of cabbages there and why? And will he be able to solve the case in time for the Royal Picnic?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep46
programme.desc: The Case Of The Queen's Special Gift - The Knights have been away travelling around Toyland and they each return with a special gift for the Queen. But the last Knight to arrive back was so busy having fun that he forgot to bring back a present for the Queen. Noddy assures him the Queen won't mind but the poor Knight is adamant he must give her something. Noddy sets out to help him find the perfect gift.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep47
programme.desc: The Case of the Pirates' Missing Treasure - When the Pockets find an old treasure map, the Pirates are delighted. They race off to find the treasure. Only to come back rather confused. They found a treasure chest but it ran away! Noddy investigates: "What's happened to the Pirates' treasure?"

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep48
programme.desc: The Case Of The Frozen Toys - Noddy and Big Ears come to Fable Forest to see the Queen Sparklewings's magic crystal collection. But when they arrive at the Fairy Castle, they find all the toys there frozen like statues. What's going on. It's up to Noddy to investigate and help his friends return to their normal selves.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep19
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jungle Gym - An over enthusiastic Raa Raa breaks Pias new Jungle Gym but he manages to fix it so everyone can have a turn.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep20
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Drip Drop Waterfall - The waterfall has lost its tinkly tonk sound so Raa Raa and his friends set out to find it.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep21
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Noisy Nap - Raa Raa and his friends are looking for a rumbly noise while Crocky tries to find a quiet spot for a nap.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep22
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jungle Journey - Raa Raa and his friends go on a journey driving their vehicles all over the Jingly Jangly Jungle.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep45
programme.desc: Crash Landing - Hellie makes an emergency landing. Despite everyone's efforts, Hellie won't fly again… what could the problem be?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep46
programme.desc: Plugger's New Job - James has broken down so Mama Mia comandeers Plugger to run her about. Mama Mia has a wonderful time with Plugger and James is jealous. He tries to remedy the situation with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep47
programme.desc: Big Chris Gets Lucky - Big Chris realises that he only ever has good luck when he has his lucky mascot with him. But what happens when he loses it on race day?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep48
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Fun Run - Roary and Plugger really want Big Chris to take part in the fun run but Big Chris isn't so sure. Can they make sure he trains for it without even realising?

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep23
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Creature Catcher / Slugby - Revenge of the Creature Catcher Casper, Mantha and Ra accidentally lead Jimmy's father to the underworld.Slugby. To prove that the teachers haven't gone soft, Alder and Dash stage a Slugby match.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep24
programme.desc: You Oughta Be In Pictures / Crypt Critters - You Oughta Be in Pictures When Mantha sees a Deedstown mob attacking a group of fellow zombies, she's determined to lead them in a counterattack. Crypt Critters Mantha comes down with an embarrassing case of crypt critters, but refuses to go to the nurse.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp’s locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep55
programme.desc: Caballo Sin Cabeza - When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep29
programme.desc: Glitter Loss / New Anthem - When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he and the Snack Pack embark on an epic journey to the fabled fountain of glitter to get his glitter back./ Poppy decides that it’s time for a new, Bergen-fear-free Troll anthem, so she creates a song competition to see which Troll can write the best new anthem.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep29
programme.desc: Dance Dance Resolution - After reuniting with his parents, King Julien doesn't want them to leave so he recreates a booty-shaking dance recital they had never seen.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep3
programme.desc: Lucky And The Mysterious Map - During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep29
programme.desc: Jolly Olde England - Wally and Wenda's plan to watch a soccer game in London is interrupted when Odlulu and Fritz use the Key in the Stone to summon a medieval castle in the middle of modern-day England. It's up to the Wanderers to stop King Fritz before his knights turn London upside down!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep9
programme.desc: Dog the Right Thing - In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? The car parts are scattered throughout Pawston. \ The Not Yet Cadets compete in the final race to see which team will join the Race Cadets.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep9
programme.desc: Home Alone - Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep17
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unhelpful Queen - One of the Knights has tried a magic spell but it went wrong and he's shrunk! Queen Sparklewings could help him but she's hiding and won't come out. It's up to Noddy to investigate and work out why the Queen is hiding and how to persuade her to help the Knight grow again. With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! Once Noddy shows her how to remove the felt pen the Queen stops hiding and the Knight can return to the right size. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep18
programme.desc: The Case Of The Mystery Artist - There's a mystery in Toyland! All the toys have drawn pictures of Deltoid but they've all been scribbled on and ruined! Noddy opens the investigation to find out who is the mystery artist. Using his wwwbook to follow the clues, Noddy realises that it's Deltoid who was drawing on all the pictures because he didn't think any of them look like him! Noddy suggests that they draw pictures again – and this time Deltoid can draw his own picture too. Clever Noddy's saved the day!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep31
programme.desc: Egg's Day Out / The Way of the Snake - Archibald takes care of a lost egg for the day. But when the egg starts to crack, Archibald has to get the egg back to its parents. / After Archibald’s arms fall asleep, he joins a dojo ran by snakes and embraces a life without appendages.

programme.desc: Agent Ace/Smoove As Ice - Chet can't get him on a cereal box, so Turbo makes Ace Gecko his sports agent; Smoove Move competes in a ski race to prove his worth -- all for love.

Rocksy tries various attempts to challenge her nature.

All the toys are very excited, but before the race starts the tyres of Deltoid's tribike are burst! Could it be one of the contestants trying to prevent him from winning the race? Noddy needs to find out so that the race can take place.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep251
programme.desc: Sleepover - Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zoë Zebra’s house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep131
programme.desc: The Box of Secrets - Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep132
programme.desc: Bubu's Robot - Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep320
programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep814
programme.desc: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show - Before the big play, a stage prop collapses and traps Cap'n Turbot. Pups to the rescue!

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Fountain Fiasco/Night of the Disco Lights - Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Den Build Disaster/Winter Lights - Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector - It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Potato Stew - Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Busy Baby - Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep128
programme.desc: The Statue of Friendship - Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep133
programme.desc: Froga's Choice - Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep158
programme.desc: Go Find it ! - Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Great Spring Clean - Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S4 Ep411
programme.desc: Power Tires - When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good. Luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires - high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs to keep rolling.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S3 Ep318
programme.desc: Need for Blazing Speed - When Crusher tries to get Blazing Speed for himself, he accidentally sends Blaze's engine flying! Now it's Blaze vs. Crusher in a race for Blazing Speed-but without an engine, Blaze must find new ways to propel himself to victory.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger / Pups Save A Royal Painting - When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep220
programme.desc: Dinobot/Forest Squad in Space - Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Berry Bad - Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington and The House Guest / Paddington and The Banana - Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized. // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost - Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep608
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Sleepwell! - All is not well in the normally well-rested Kingdom of Sleepwell: Princess Deema can't fall asleep! Her Royal Court comes to her aid, but when even magic doesn't work, she learns that all she needed to do was follow her bedtime routine!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Hide and Seek with Blue - Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue / The Compass Caper - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Kiko's Song - When the coquís of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin - Goldie's reputation as a great party hostess is on the line when she forgets to buy treats for her guests.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Rocky-Bye - Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Banana - Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Paddington Takes to the Ice - There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep135
programme.desc: The Remember-ator - Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep136
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt - Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Blue's Big Baking Show - It's a sweet and delicious day at Blue's Bakery, because Josh and Blue are baking bibingka, a cake from the Philippines! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who Blue wants to bake for, and help the Banana Baker collect bananas for her Monkey Muffins!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies / Pups Save the Green House - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Cosmic Circus/A Hole Lot of Trouble - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely? // Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Goodnight Central Forest / Steelzilla - When Sir Steel does not want to get out of bed, Professor Scratch plunges the whole city into darkness with a gigantic pair of sunglasses. // Sir Steel holds a grand parade but his giant Steel blimp grows to Godzilla sized and trashes the city!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddingtons Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist - Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Bread - Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris / Born To Be Wild - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep139
programme.desc: Leaf Portraits - When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep133
programme.desc: Froga's Choice - Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep134
programme.desc: The Great Friendship Show - Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep135
programme.desc: The Remember-ator - Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep136
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt - Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S4 Ep412
programme.desc: Snow Day Showdown - It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate! But when Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, Blaze is in hot pursuit to get it back!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S4 Ep402
programme.desc: The Pickle Family Campout - When all the members of Pickle's family get lost in the woods, Pickle teams up with Tow Truck Blaze to come to their rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort / Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort. // When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Save The Bees / Duck Dilemma - All the bees in the Central Forest are captured by Sir Steel for their honey and Deer Squad have to come to their rescue! // Kai invents a Roboduck to babysit the ducklings, but it goes haywire and takes down all the technology in Platinum City.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep207
programme.desc: What's up Lola - A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film - Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Paddington Finds A Pigeon / Paddington and Chores List - Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go? // The family all have chores except Paddington. So as not to be excluded, Mr. Brown creates a list for him to follow, but Paddington picks up the wrong list.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep501
programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep609
programme.desc: The Jaw-some Sharkventure! - Zooli and her crew of Marine Biologists escort their new friends Baby Shark and his pilot fish William to visit Baby Shark's great-great-great-great-great Uncle Slow Mo, and help them escape the determined fisherman who's chasing them!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Blue's Big Dance Party - Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Welcome to Blue's Bistro - Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceañera - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep98
programme.desc: Up High - The Teletubbies bounce on The Tubby Bouncy. Po bounces as high as a cloud, then Laa-Laa bounces higher, Dipsy bounces even higher and Tinky Winky bounces highest of all.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep3
programme.desc: Carrot - Dee encourages a friend to say 'carrot' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of carrots!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: Home Away From Home - A sleepover at Finn's would be great fun if Herman wasn't feeling so homesick.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep28
programme.desc: It's Time to Make a Volcano - When Great Gran Gran teaches JoJo all about volcanoes, Gran Gran has a plan. Why don't they make a mini volcano of their own?

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep56
programme.desc: Bath Night - Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep55
programme.desc: Monty Repeats Himself - A teacher asks Monty to paint something new instead of repeating himself, but Monty thinks repetition can sometimes be useful.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep28
programme.desc: Movies - It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep41
programme.desc: The Grandparents Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are tidying up - its Bring your Grandparents to Squirrel Club Day. Duggee has his Grandparents badge so he knows what they will like, a nice cup of tea.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep40

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep39
programme.desc: The Getting On Badge - When the squirrels upset the mole by being noisy, Duggee suggests ways that they can all live underground peacefully.

programme.title: Roger
programme.desc: Roger tells Fatou a joke and it’s a really stupid joke because Roger can’t tell it right and it’s really embarrassing for Fatou because she really doesn’t dare tell her friend that he is a terrible joke teller. Still, Roger is aware of his shortcomings and is sorry, he knows he blew it. He would like so much to make Fatou laugh with a good joke, kind of like Igor does. So he decides to take joke-telling lessons with Igor, since Igor is apparently the king of jokes. But it backfires, Roger is still way too serious! But still determined to make Fatou laugh at one of his jokes, the alien decides that science is the solution. He invents a laughter ray which accompanies his jokes and it turns out to work pretty well. In fact so well that Irina, who is inadvertently struck by the ray, can’t stop laughing herself...to the point of endangering her life...!

programme.title: Roger
programme.desc: Really tired of the fact that Fatou doesn’t understand all her important responsibilities, Roger decides to change lives with her for a few hours. A little bit of his techno-alien-magic and bingo, Fatou and Roger have changed bodies. Problem: Fatou-Roger really gets into this new life while Roger-Fatou is swept off by dad. To complicate matters, the mind-altering machine goes all haywire and pretty soon, our heroes minds find themselves inside a soccer ball and a monkey wrench. This won’t make things easy to set things straight. In the end, Fatou understands that the life of an alien is not all fun and games and Roger understands that the life of a little girl is no paradise either...

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Song vs. Simon
programme.desc: Prelims - With five consecutive victories, including back-to-back finishes of Raphael Assuncao and Jack Shore, Ricky Simon put himself on the fast track to a shot at the bantamweight title, but on April 29, he will have to make his case even stronger by getting past Chinese contender Song Yadong in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Winner of three of his last four, with knockouts of Julio Arce and Marlon Moraes, Song can change the direction of a fight with one punch, and he plans on letting Simon know that as soon as the Octagon door shuts

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Song vs. Simon
programme.desc: Main Event - With five consecutive victories, including back-to-back finishes of Raphael Assuncao and Jack Shore, Ricky Simon put himself on the fast track to a shot at the bantamweight title, but on April 29, he will have to make his case even stronger by getting past Chinese contender Song Yadong in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Winner of three of his last four, with knockouts of Julio Arce and Marlon Moraes, Song can change the direction of a fight with one punch, and he plans on letting Simon know that as soon as the Octagon door shuts

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC257PoiriervsMcGregor2
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fans a retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep13
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep18
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep6
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1005UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between long reigning middleweight king Kamaru “The Nigerian Nightmare” Usman and UFC vet Leon “Rocky” Edwards. See their fight like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2308
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: CryptoData Motorrad Grand Prix von Österreich Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship returned to Austria in 2016 after a break of 18 years, with the country hosting a motorcycle Grand Prix event at the Red Bull Ring in Spielberg - the last time being in 1997. Austria’s first Grand Prix took place in 1971 at the Salzburgring circuit, which hosted Grand Prix racing on a total of 22 occasions, until 1994. The Spielberg Red Bull Ring is beautifully situated in the Murtal region of Styria and was originally built in 1969, then known as the Österreichring. In 1996 it was rebuilt with the track-layout it still has today, and hosted Grand Prix events for two years as the ‘A1-Ring’, before being reopened as the ‘Red Bull Ring’ in 2011.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2308
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 288: Sterling vs. Cejudo
programme.desc: Prelims - The bad blood has been boiling, and on May 7, UFC bantamweight champion Aljamain Sterling and Henry “Triple C” Cejudo will settle their score in the main event of UFC 288 at Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey. Returning to the Octagon for the first time since his May 2020 victory over Dominick Cruz, Cejudo is one of the most decorated athletes in combat sports with an Olympic gold medal in wrestling and bantamweight and flyweight world titles in the UFC. But on this Cinco de Mayo weekend, the proud Mexican-American will be in with the best bantamweight in the world in Sterling, the current titleholder who has won eight in a row, defeating Cory Sandhagen, Petr Yan and TJ Dillashaw along the way.

programme.title: UFC 288: Sterling vs. Cejudo
programme.desc: Main Event - The bad blood has been boiling, and on May 7, UFC bantamweight champion Aljamain Sterling and Henry “Triple C” Cejudo will settle their score in the main event of UFC 288 at Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey. Returning to the Octagon for the first time since his May 2020 victory over Dominick Cruz, Cejudo is one of the most decorated athletes in combat sports with an Olympic gold medal in wrestling and bantamweight and flyweight world titles in the UFC. But on this Cinco de Mayo weekend, the proud Mexican-American will be in with the best bantamweight in the world in Sterling, the current titleholder who has won eight in a row, defeating Cory Sandhagen, Petr Yan and TJ Dillashaw along the way.

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep403UsmanvsBurns
programme.desc: In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes’ journeys to the Octagon and relive Usman’s performance as he cements his place in UFC history.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2309

programme.title: 2023 Grande Prémio Tissot de Portugal Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Nestled in the beautiful setting of Portugal’s Algarve, the 100,000 capacity Autodromo Internacional do Algarve – known more colloquially as Portimao, after the port city it sits half an hour outside – was opened on the 2nd of November, 2008. The circuit was inaugurated by WorldSBK when they headed to Portugal for their final round of that season – but it’s not just a racetrack. The Algarve Motorsports Park is a state-of-the-art complex which boasts the stunning race track, a go-kart track, an off-road park, a hotel, an apartment complex, a technology park and a sports complex – it really is the bee’s knees.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2309
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 288: Sterling vs. Cejudo
programme.desc: Prelims - The bad blood has been boiling, and on May 7, UFC bantamweight champion Aljamain Sterling and Henry “Triple C” Cejudo will settle their score in the main event of UFC 288 at Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey. Returning to the Octagon for the first time since his May 2020 victory over Dominick Cruz, Cejudo is one of the most decorated athletes in combat sports with an Olympic gold medal in wrestling and bantamweight and flyweight world titles in the UFC. But on this Cinco de Mayo weekend, the proud Mexican-American will be in with the best bantamweight in the world in Sterling, the current titleholder who has won eight in a row, defeating Cory Sandhagen, Petr Yan and TJ Dillashaw along the way.

programme.title: UFC 288: Sterling vs. Cejudo
programme.desc: Main Event - The bad blood has been boiling, and on May 7, UFC bantamweight champion Aljamain Sterling and Henry “Triple C” Cejudo will settle their score in the main event of UFC 288 at Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey. Returning to the Octagon for the first time since his May 2020 victory over Dominick Cruz, Cejudo is one of the most decorated athletes in combat sports with an Olympic gold medal in wrestling and bantamweight and flyweight world titles in the UFC. But on this Cinco de Mayo weekend, the proud Mexican-American will be in with the best bantamweight in the world in Sterling, the current titleholder who has won eight in a row, defeating Cory Sandhagen, Petr Yan and TJ Dillashaw along the way.

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep403UsmanvsBurns
programme.desc: In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes’ journeys to the Octagon and relive Usman’s performance as he cements his place in UFC history.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Song vs. Simon
programme.desc: Prelims - With five consecutive victories, including back-to-back finishes of Raphael Assuncao and Jack Shore, Ricky Simon put himself on the fast track to a shot at the bantamweight title, but on April 29, he will have to make his case even stronger by getting past Chinese contender Song Yadong in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Winner of three of his last four, with knockouts of Julio Arce and Marlon Moraes, Song can change the direction of a fight with one punch, and he plans on letting Simon know that as soon as the Octagon door shuts

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Song vs. Simon
programme.desc: Main Event - With five consecutive victories, including back-to-back finishes of Raphael Assuncao and Jack Shore, Ricky Simon put himself on the fast track to a shot at the bantamweight title, but on April 29, he will have to make his case even stronger by getting past Chinese contender Song Yadong in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Winner of three of his last four, with knockouts of Julio Arce and Marlon Moraes, Song can change the direction of a fight with one punch, and he plans on letting Simon know that as soon as the Octagon door shuts

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC257PoiriervsMcGregor2
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fans a retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC274OliveiravsGaethje
programme.desc: Two titles were on the line at UFC 274 as Charles Oliveira faced off against Justin Gaethje and Rose Namajunas took on Carla Esparza in a rematch of their Ultimate Fighter Finale bout. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep904NamajunasvsZhang2
programme.desc: New York’s Madison Square Garden hosted a rematch between “Thug” Rose Namajunas and Zhang Weili at UFC 268. See both women train and prepare for battle once again to decide the queen of the strawweight division.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC275TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: Whose titles were on the line at UFC 275 as Glover Teixeira faced Jiri Prochazka and Valentina Shevchenko took on Taila Santos. Plus, Joanna Jedrzejczyk returned to face Zhang Weili in an epic rematch. See the main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep2
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep20
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
